sent_text: It is the deepest kind of green , a green that yielded to sunglight in only the most miserly , scant beams , allowing almost no details to be easily visible on the little brown wrens that hopped along the branches .
prev_sent: It is the completeness of the forest , from the moss and lichens hanging from the trees to the dense carpet of ferns and underbrush at your feet .
next_sent: Alongside the trail , the Salmon River gurgled , as clear as tap water .
